sentences.en: As the tabloid have hit on hard times, the cheque of chequebook journalism have shrink.
sentences.cn: 随著小报纸的不景气, 买断独家采访权的金额也跟著缩减了.

sentences.en: As the tabloids have hit on hard times, the cheques of chequebook journalism have shrunk.
sentences.cn: 随着小报纸的不景气, 买断独家采访权的金额也跟着缩减了.

sentences.en: Can you please let me have a chequebook of 30 cheques?
sentences.cn: 请给我一本三十页的支票簿好 吗 ?

sentences.en: He threw me a chequebook . I wrote the sum and passed it back.
sentences.cn: 他扔给我了一本支票簿. 我把总额写好并还给了他.

sentences.en: The woman took out her chequebook and quickly made out four cheques.
sentences.cn: 那个女人拿出支票簿迅速开了4张支票。

sentences.en: To his consternation , he realized that he had left his chequebook at home.
sentences.cn: 他意识到他把支票簿留在家里就惊惶了.

trans.tran_en: a small book of cheques that your bank gives you
